        public void setAll(IOConfig config)
        Sets all configuration properties retrieved from the specified config.
        指定者:
        setAll 在接口中 IOConfig
        覆盖:
        setAll 在类中 AbstractIOConfig
        参数:
        config - The configuration to use

      • getConnectTimeoutMs

        public long getConnectTimeoutMs()
        Get the connect timeout milliseconds which will be used for all sessions' connect operation
        返回:
        connect timeout milliseconds

        public void setConnectTimeoutMs(long connectTimeoutMs)
        Set the connect timeout milliseconds,
        参数:

      • getSoLinger

        public abstract int getSoLinger()
        Please note that enabling SO_LINGER in Java NIO can result in platform-dependent behavior and unexpected blocking of I/O thread.
        返回:
        The value for SO_LINGER
        另请参阅:
        Socket.getSoLinger()

      • setSoLinger

        public abstract void setSoLinger(int soLinger)
        Please note that enabling SO_LINGER in Java NIO can result in platform-dependent behavior and unexpected blocking of I/O thread.
        参数:
        soLinger - Please specify a negative value to disable SO_LINGER.
        另请参阅:
        Socket.setSoLinger(boolean, int)
